Hello all, rAuq here. I'm not connected to the net (i'm using a comp 
in the computer store at UVic) yet but I'm hoping to buy a computer 
soon. I've been sort of inactive, and I'm hoping to get back and 
start post regularly. I have no clue what has happened to my 
characters, or what has happened in the rpg lately and it would 
probably take many pages of info to completely bring me up to date -- 
in other words, don't bother replying to this post with the desired 
information. =P (Jer, if you don't mind, i'll be contacting you soon 
for an update.) I don't have much to say right now other than the 
above... k, later people. =)

rAuq
